setEffects.4: Incoming elemental DMG increases corresponding Elemental RES by 30% for 10s. Can only occur once every 10s.

flower.name: Tiny Miracle's Flower
flower.desc: A flower that grew from a rock, breaking through the stone as it strove to reach the light.

plume.name: Tiny Miracle's Feather
plume.desc: A feather from a bird of prey that flies almost too fast for the human eye to detect.

sands.name: Tiny Miracle's Hourglass
sands.desc: Just an ordinary, everyday hourglass. Turn it upside down and sure enough, the dry sand starts trickling down like water.

goblet.name: Tiny Miracle's Goblet
goblet.desc: A cup commonly used for fortune-telling. It can also hold water, of course.

circlet.name: Tiny Miracle's Earrings
circlet.desc: A cheap accessory that is actually made from ancient meteoric ore.
